title: "shp_proc"
format: html

---

```{r}
library(readr)
library(sf)
library(ggplot2)
library(leaflet)
library(scales)
library(ggspatial)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
reg <- read_sf("data/32p_sp1.shp")
nrow(reg)
head(reg)
```
```{r}

reg2 <- reg %>%
 mutate (CL_AGE1 = CL_AGE, .after= CL_AGE)
reg2 <- reg2 %>%
 mutate (CL_AGE2 = CL_AGE, .after= CL_AGE1)
reg2 <- reg2 %>%
 mutate (cohort1 = Sp1, .after= CL_AGE2)
reg2 <- reg2 %>%
 mutate (cohort2 = Sp2, .after= cohort1)

```

```{r}
head(reg2)
ncol(reg2)
```

```{r}
write_sf(reg, "data/32p_sp2.shp")
```
